definition: rain on Mt Ba (idiom); lonely in a strange land/Evening Rain, 1980 movie about the Cultural Revolution
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
late at night/in the dead of night
limpid autumn waters (trad. description of girl's beautiful eyes)
see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]
to walk in the snow to view the flowering plum
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
